description: Are you still worried about the mess left after washing dishes? Are you still troubled by water stains on the bottom of the faucet? Xoster kitchen accessories for countertop can help you! Just slip it into the bottom of your faucet and you're done! This sink splatter guard for kitchen is easy to install, fits snugly against the faucet, and you'll never worry about water being left on the mat or counter. Drain the water directly into the sink, keep your countertops and faucet bases clean and dry at all times. Better fabric types are better for drainage. You won't have to worry about splattering your countertops. This means no puddles to clean up & no water spots by the faucet.
